channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Naturally Active
channel.desc: Liz Earle is an award-winning British beauty brand renowned for creating naturally active skincare and bodycare products, which help to deliver real results for all ages and skin types.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Hush Puppies
channel.desc: Committed to quality, design and value for money, Hush Puppies have become a household name and offer a wide range of ladies' footwear styles to suit any outfit.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Summer Fashion with Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Malissa J Collection
channel.desc: Discover the Malissa J Collection and indulge in fashion and accessories that boast the latest trends, exceptional quality, and chic, versatile day-to-night designs offered at affordable prices.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Afternoon Style with Katy
channel.desc: Discover the latest trends from the biggest fashion brands with a little help from QVC presenter, Katy.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Coastal Edit with Denim & Co
channel.desc: Get Holiday Ready with Denim & Co., showcasing a range of fashionable and on-trend pieces that will instantly enhance your summer fashion edit.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Naturally Active
channel.desc: Liz Earle is an award-winning British beauty brand renowned for creating naturally active skincare and bodycare products, which help to deliver real results for all ages and skin types.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty with Perfect Formula
channel.desc: Flaunt your fingers with Perfect Formula, offering luxury nailcare that looks gorgeous, whatever the occasion. Achieve a professional-looking, at-home mani with a little help from the experts.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion to flatter your shape with Dannii Minogue's beautiful range of on-trend styles, which offers a full spectrum of petite and regular sizes designed to help you find your perfect fit.
